Version Update guide
For ImGui:
    - copy file cmakelists.txt, imgui_custom.cpp and parts (a total of 3) of imgui.h & imgui_internal.h that are marked as "MUNI_CUSTOM"
    - add them to the updated code. 
    - make the parts compliant with newer verstion of imgui if necessary
    - check if ImGuizmo is compliant
